targets.queryText:
SELECT
    month AS "Month",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Revenue",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Cost of Revenue",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Expenses",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Income' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Other Income",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Other Expense",
    (
        SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      + SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Income' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
    ) AS "Sorted Net",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Sort Me (Inbound)' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Unsorted Income",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Sort Me (Outbound)' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Unsorted Expense",
    (
        SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      + SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Income' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      + SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Sort Me (Inbound)' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Sort Me (Outbound)' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
    ) AS "Net"
FROM (
    SELECT
        strftime('%Y-%m', datetime(t.timestamp, 'unixepoch')) AS month,
        gh.top_category,
        COALESCE(t.value_usd, 0) AS value_usd
    FROM treasury_txs AS t
    JOIN txgroups AS tg ON t.txgroup_id = tg.txgroup_id
    JOIN txgroup_hierarchy AS gh ON tg.txgroup_id = gh.txgroup_id
    WHERE t.timestamp >= $__from / 1000 AND tg.name <> 'Ignore'
) AS s
GROUP BY month;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
    month AS "Month",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Revenue",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Cost of Revenue",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Expenses",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Income' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Other Income",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Other Expense",
    (
        SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      + SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Income' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
    ) AS "Sorted Net",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Sort Me (Inbound)' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Unsorted Income",
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Sort Me (Outbound)' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Unsorted Expense",
    (
        SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      + SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Income' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Other Expenses' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      + SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Sort Me (Inbound)' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN s.top_category = 'Sort Me (Outbound)' THEN value_usd ELSE 0 END)
    ) AS "Net"
FROM (
    SELECT
        strftime('%Y-%m', datetime(t.timestamp, 'unixepoch')) AS month,
        gh.top_category,
        COALESCE(t.value_usd, 0) AS value_usd
    FROM treasury_txs AS t
    JOIN txgroups AS tg ON t.txgroup_id = tg.txgroup_id
    JOIN txgroup_hierarchy AS gh ON tg.txgroup_id = gh.txgroup_id
    WHERE t.timestamp >= strftime('%s', '2025-01-01') AND tg.name <> 'Ignore'
) AS s
GROUP BY month;

title: Monthly P&L
description: Summarizes the DAO's monthly profit and loss, providing a breakdown of sorted and unsorted financial activity for each month. Supports financial reporting and tracking the progress of transaction categorization.
